personalInfo.name: Your Name
personalInfo.title: A passionate developer creating amazing projects
personalInfo.description: Welcome to my portfolio where I showcase my latest projects and development work. Explore my creations and see what I've been building.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a passionate developer who loves creating innovative solutions and bringing ideas to life through code. With experience in various technologies and frameworks, I enjoy tackling challenging problems and continuously learning new skills.

My focus is on creating user-friendly applications with clean, efficient code and modern design principles. I believe in the power of technology to make a positive impact and solve real-world problems.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how we can bring it to life

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with React frontend, Node.js backend, and MongoDB database. Features include user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A responsive task management application built with Vue.js and Firebase. Includes drag-and-drop functionality, real-time updates, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Weather Mobile App
projects.description: A cross-platform mobile application built with React Native. Features location-based weather forecasts, offline caching, and beautiful animations.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Built with vanilla JavaScript and optimized for performance and SEO.

projects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive dashboard for data visualization using D3.js and Python backend. Features real-time charts, filtering, and export functionality.

projects.title: Desktop Note-Taking App
projects.description: A cross-platform desktop application built with Electron. Features rich text editing, file organization, and cloud synchronization.
